issue.title: Frequent escalate to SIGKILL on shutdown

content.raw:
I should say that, with the above-referenced changes, I can get Gazebo, with and without DRCSim code loaded, to exit pretty much immediately in response to a Ctrl-C delivered at any time.

I won't be surprised if there are still hang conditions possible, but I'm no longer able to trigger any in my testing.
